Quick question though, Am I going to need to run these in DOSbox or are these compatible with Windows 7?

installed easily. but when i click on the shortcuts to run either game nothing happens...

?

FINALLY I got this game to work. Just make sure it's on the C:\ or whatever drive you use with the system. I've been trying to run it on the H:\ drive and nothing happened, just tried that now and it's okay =]
Thanks for uploading it! Cheers
